captions.text: OK, guys. Show us what you got.
God save us.
Kill 'em! Kill the bastards!
I do not believe my friggin' eyes.
These guys are a fucking disgrace.

And I'm telling you, Broom County
is just visibly upset by this display.

Get places for the home games.
Bring the kids.

We got entertainment
for the whole family.

There goes Jeff Hanson
into the corner. No, it's Jack.

17. I'll have to check that later.
A crushing check on the boards!
Things are really going on out there now!

Now Steve is in front of the net. I think
that's Steve. Yes. No. Yeah, it is Steve.

And I think that was Jack.
It was Jeff or Jack.
These brothers are stomping all over...

- You! Out!
- What?

- You! Out!
- Huh? What for?

- You! Out!
- No! No!

- Get your eyes examined, you idiot!
- What are you doin'?

- They're all gone!
- It was self-defence, for Christ's sake!

- They're gone!
- How much do you expect a man to take?

- Don't come near me.
- Are you runnin' a goddamn dance?

title: The Hansons Play Dirty - Slap Shot (6/10) Movie CLIP (1977) HD

comments.author: Frank McLean

comments.text:
These guys were actually real players, the carlson brothers, who played for 
the Johnstown jets of the old North american hockey league. The whole 
league was like this. My town, Binghamton ny, had a team called the Broome 
dusters(we are in broome county) in the league. The league is what inspired 
the movie, and Paul Newman actually came to see a game at our arena to 
research his part.Heres an interesting article about the league..
http://m.pressconnects.com/sports/article?a=2014305170006&f=965﻿

comments.text:
True story: my high school history teacher was a HUGE hockey fan. During 
the school year we prodded her relentlessly on why she liked it to which 
she would maintain it was "Technique and excitement. Of course we always 
knew the truth. Finally, on the last day, we more or less had her cornered 
and asked her the truth. She smirked sheepishly and said....the fights.
